AllQuotes.phrase: "Trouble don't last always. Better enjoy life now before it's too late."

"Oh, you think darkness is your ally. But you merely adopted the dark; I was born in it, molded by it. I didn't see the light until I was already a man, by then it was nothing to me but BLINDING! The shadows betray you, because they belong to me!"
"It's not who you are underneath, it's what you do that defines you."

"You gotta be bad, you gotta be bold You gotta be wiser, you gotta be hard You gotta be tough, you gotta be strongerYou gotta be cool, you gotta be calm You gotta stay together
                All I know, all I know, love will save the day"

"I'm not perfectSo I try everyday and I grow a little bitRead a little more so I can educate my kidsReap for my soul and cleanse my spirit
              Pray cause I'm ready for the bloom of the seaPeace and serenity is all that I need"
"Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself."
